fullplot: Against the tumultuous backdrop of Iran's 1953 CIA-backed coup d'ètat, the destinies of four women converge in a beautiful orchard garden, where they find independence, solace and companionship.
plot: Against the tumultuous backdrop of Iran's 1953 CIA-backed coup d'ètat, the destinies of four women converge in a beautiful orchard garden, where they find independence, solace and companionship.
title: Women Without Men

tomatoes.consensus: Its reach may exceed its grasp, but Women Without Men's beautiful imagery and quiet elegance will entrance patient viewers.

writers: Steven Henry Madoff (voiceovers and additional dialogue)
